text: The Vagina Monologues is a monologue play written by Eve Ensler. The production has been staged in many countries. Ensler originally starred in the play by herself, but she was later replaced by three celebrity monologists. A television version featuring Ensler was shown on cable TV channel HBO. Much of the profits made from the production went to women's anti-violence charities. ==References== ==Other websites== *The Vagina Monologues at Random House *V-Day official site *Official UK Page *The Vagina Monologues at HBO.com * Category:Women Category:American plays Category:1996 plays
title: The Vagina Monologues
